actions

Class Swimmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
      • actions.Scheduler
        • actions.SequentialScheduler
          • actions.Swimmer

  • public class Swimmer
extends SequentialScheduler
    Swimmer is a extension of SequentialScheduler.

    It represent the process of a person going to the pool, therefore it needs to use resources and to several steps.

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Swimmer

        public Swimmer(java.lang.String name,
       BasketPool basket,
       CubiclePool cubicle,
       int timeUndressed,
       int timeSwim,
       int timeDressed)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the swimmer
        basket - the pool of resources where the swimmer takes its basket
        cubicle - the pool of resources where the swimmer takes its cubicle
        timeUndressed - the time the swimmer takes to get undressed
        timeSwim - the time the swimmer actually swim
        timeDressed - the time the swimmer takes to get dressed
